sentence.Network_en: He criticized them for dressing outrageously and posing pretentiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 他批评她们衣着暴露而且矫揉造作。
这个作者有点自我吹捧.

sentence.Network_en: The term describes a pretentiously showy or impressive facade to draw attention away from dirty conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 它表示自负的华丽或令人印象深刻的假象来吸引远离肮脏情况的注意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在一较为贫困的缅甸家庭，家长给小孩儿庆祝(Celebrate)生日，糊一个DV机，并煞有介事(Pretentiously)拍摄小孩的欢歌。知识是打开 …

list.abs: Full of empty or pretentious language ; bombastic ., 言过其实的充满空洞或虚假的语言 ; 吹牛的.
Showy or gaudy decoration ; ostentatious or pretentious show ., 炫耀的或俗丽的装饰 ; 浮华的或虚假的显示.
Character  -... ... 花池子[ flower bed] 花架子[ nice but false appearance;pretentious flourish] 淮南子[ Huainan Zi].
He is a pretentious writer ., 他是个自负的作家.

auth_sentence.content: I say study, but more accurately and less pretentiously it's an office.
